segments.text: I notice the kitchen setup with the sink on the right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is running from the faucet into the full basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over the edge onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands facing away from the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the left, cabinets are open with the cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a step stool reaching for it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems tilted and unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate in one hand too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her arm raised toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line the way, and it's all very orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside contrasts with that calm exterior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter near her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR
